name: Plague Knight
info:
• 简体中文名: 瘟疫骑士
  • 性别: 男
detail: Plague Knight is one of eight villain knights of the Order of No Quarter who serves the Enchantress and a master alchemist. His lair is the Explodatorium. He is also the protagonist of Plague of Shadows, in which he seeks to craft the Ultimate Potion from the Essence of the Order's members.

jobs.name: Shovel Knight Showdown
jobs.nameCn: 铲子骑士究极巅峰决战
